titleStmt.title: John W. Finnell to Daniel C. Wickliffe
CWG7697

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Military Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p:
UNITED WE STAND DIVIDED WE FALL
Head-Quarters Kentucky Volunteers,
ADJUTANT GENERAL'S OFFICE.
Louisville, Septr 9. 1862
Hon: D. C. Wickliffe
Sec: State
I have this day issd. & delivered the following Commissions viz:

Wm Robert McChesney 1 Lieut: dated Sep. 9. 1862
Wm A. Bullitt Adjutant -- dated July 13. 1862
Jacob Cooper Chaplain -- dated Sept. 9. 1862
Over
Cortland W. King 1 Lieut: is drownded date of Com: Jany. 22. 1862.

Resply
John W. Finnell
Adjt Genl Ken. Vols:
